quiz.question: Which collective noun names a group of elephants traveling together?
Which collective noun is used when hippos gather in water?
Which rare collective noun describes a group of pelicans on the water surface?
Which collective noun is widely used for many fish swimming together?
Which collective noun names a group of bees living together in a hive?
Which rare collective noun names a group of vultures feeding on a carcass?
Which collective noun traditionally refers to a group of young kittens?
Which medieval term describes the category of fanciful collective nouns for animals?
Which collective noun historically applied to a group of bears in medieval lists?
Which collective noun names geese when they are on the ground together?
Which collective noun describes a group of eagles gathered together in one place?
Which collective noun refers to a small group of hares gathered together?
Which collective noun describes multiple ships sailing together under one command?
Which collective noun names a group of turkeys in trees or on structures?
Which collective noun describes a group of lemurs moving together in Madagascar?
